H0.text: In which district of East London did Jack the Ripper operate. Bethnal Green

H1.text: In which district of East London did Jack the Ripper operate. Shoreditch

H2.text: In which district of East London did Jack the Ripper operate. Spitalfields

H3.text: In which district of East London did Jack the Ripper operate. Whitechapel

A4.text: Whitechapel and neighbouring Spitalfields were the locations of the infamous 11 Whitechapel murders (1888–91), some of which were committed by the legendary serial killer known as 'Jack the Ripper'.

A5.text: The 11 Whitechapel murders (1888–91), some of which were committed by Jack the Ripper, occurred in Whitechapel and were associated with the area's historical notoriety.
